channel.title: Lessons on Mike Jick | PGA Golf Professional
channel.description: Recent content in Lessons on Mike Jick | PGA Golf Professional

item.title: Back to Basics
item.description: I normally advise golfers to hit the ball longer and straighter. Combine this technique with making more putts and your scores will drop. Guaranteed!

item.title: Putting Drill for Distance Control
item.description: Set up four balls at different distances from the hole: 5, 10, 15 and 20 feet.
